70010000085470.description:
The 1983 classic multi-room platformer Montezuma’s Revenge returns in 2.5D glory, and now Pedro’s adventure is bigger than ever with 100 tricky rooms to explore! For its 40th anniversary, what was once an unfinished game is now resurrected to match the full vision of creator Robert Jaeger. This time you can choose between male and female explorers, Pedro or his sister Rosita, to delve deep into the dangerous ruins and hunt for treasures untold!

Montezuma’s Revenge: The 40th Anniversary Edition is remade from the ground up with vibrant 3D visuals while preserving the 1983 original’s 2D gameplay style. Run, jump and climb your way through tricky chambers to collect valuable artifacts, avoid perilous traps and fiendish enemies, find keys to progress and survive a final showdown to escape with your riches… and your life!

• Choose between adventurous male and female protagonists!
• Explore 100 tricky chambers filled with traps, treasures and roving baddies.
• Collect valuable artifacts as you solve the ruins’ many mysteries!
• Enjoy retro aesthetics reimagined in vibrant 2.5D style.
• Relive a timeless video game classic in its most complete form ever!
70010000085470.intro: Experience a timeless classic adventure now fully evolved and complete for the first time!
70010000085470.name: Montezuma's Revenge - The 40th Anniversary Edition

70010000090625.description:
You play as Morgan, an aspiring engineer headed home to complete your family's dream project - a rocket ship! Finding home not quite how she left it, Morgan will need to research and build clever contraptions and sprawling factories to help the locals. From simple drills and furnaces to complex assemblers, cranes and miles of conveyor belts, you'll convert local resources into useful materials and bring industry back to sleepy St. Ambroise.

- Build clever contraptions and sprawling factories to solve puzzles and help the town
- Get to know the locals, make lifelong friendships and become the heart of the community
- Research and invent new machines, energy sources and mechanical friends
- Discover a heartwarming story as Morgan, an aspiring engineer with high hopes for town!
- Finally build your family's rocket ship!

Outside of smashing together crazy contraptions, you'll need to mine out resources, explore coasts, railyards, quarries and underground areas - each part of town has its own materials to inspire you! You'll need to complete challenges, incorporate electrical elements, water, cranes, furnaces, crafting, automate through robotics, and loads more to ensure St. Ambroise returns to its former glory. Are you ready to roll up your sleeves?
70010000090625.name: Little Rocket Lab

70010000092111.description:
New challenging levels are here! Solve the puzzles and save the little puppies. This is still the best way to spend your time!   

You still have to draw the lines so the angry bees can't even touch the puppy. All new levels will challenge your brain and skills. Still find the best solution in each level. The bees won't stop until they reach the goal. Keep them away as long as you can!       

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Continue to show your love for all the animals in the world!
70010000092111.intro: New puppy rescue mission from the evil bees!
70010000092111.name: Save The Doge 2

70010000095538.description:
Tired of feeling trapped at home, Moka, a spoiled cat, decides to run away and seek adventure. His journey takes an unexpected turn when the kennelman threatens the streets. Moka needs to learn how to survive, and appreciate what he left behind, before he's going to lose his best friend and everything he had.

FEATURES

· Explore a beautiful hand drawn watercolor world.
· Feel the magic of the animated movie classics.
· Discover the power of friendship.
· Live an emotional journey.
· Be a cat..

DO YOU WANT TO KNOW IF THIS GAME IS FOR YOU?

· Did you ever want to experience life as a cat?
· Are you into handmade animated movie classics?
· Do you like to engage in emotional stories?
· Do you like short games (around 2-3 hours of game play)?
· Are you ready for intuitive manageable challenges?

Yay, awesome! Because our game offers all of that, and much more.
70010000095538.intro: Stars in the Trash brings the magic of animated movie classics into a narrative-driven platformer that combines action, exploration and puzzles.
70010000095538.name: Stars In The Trash

70010000098350.description:
Overview

Dunjungle is an action-packed roguelite about a monkey hero, adventuring into a jungle under the menace of a corruptive power that is transforming its peaceful creatures and destroying everything on its way.

You'll explore continuously changing dungeons, temples, crypts, and other mysterious places, where you'll find all sort of weird enemies and an arsenal of weapons, spells, and relics, granting you a different experience every time you play.

Features
Lots of weapons, spells and relics with unique effects.
Equipment can also be merged with several elements, to create new and powerful versions.
Burn monsters with fire, use ice to slow them down, shock them with thunder, or just get them off you using wind to blow them away!

Classes to customize your runs
You will unlock several classes with a variety of strengths and weaknesses. You can choose the class before starting the run and play in your preferred style!

Dungeons are procedurally generated, made from big collection of hand-crafted rooms. 
These rooms are filled with all sort of weird creatures, valuable treasures, dangerous traps, and of course, challenging bosses! 

Fast Game Loop
There are no checkpoints in Dunjungle. You die, you start over. Die again, try again!
But don't worry too much. Several things will remain for your next run.  
Maybe you unlocked a new weapon? Maybe a new spell? Maybe you saved a trapped character, who will now lend you a hand.  
Along your way, you may find characters who are lost, trapped, or maybe just chilling in there. Help them out, and you might become friends! 

More importantly, each time you die, you'll know more about Dunjungle's world, so don't despair, and use what you've learned to get further on your next adventure.
70010000098350.name: Dunjungle

70010000103806.description:
Get ready to bounce into action with Pad Quad, a lightning-fast platformer where padel meets pure arcade fun! Control adorable pixel mascots inspired by QUAD Sports rackets and race across futuristic arenas packed with enemies, traps, and tricky jumps.
Collect three racket pieces before time runs out, rebound energy balls to take down robots, and keep your reflexes sharp as you leap through laser nets, dodge spinning saws, and trigger moving platforms. Each level is a quick challenge designed for instant play and pure satisfaction, perfect for anyone who loves fast runs and flashy reactions.
With simple controls, no tutorials, and a one-minute timer pushing you to the limit, Pad Quad delivers non-stop energy in bite-sized bursts of fun. Whether you’re new to games or a speedrunner at heart, you’ll find yourself smashing, bouncing, and dashing for just one more round!
70010000103806.name: Pad Quad

70010000106449.description:
Vinecard is a deck-building strategic game with roguelike elements. Choose from a roster of quirky heroes with even quirkier skills, plan your route around the game board, grab the goodies and defeat the baddies. Navigate your hero around a game board of limited grids, one step at a time.

Sounds boring? Well, throw in a deck of 200+ unique cards, and watch the chemical reactions happen. 8 playable characters with wildly different styles/skills further increase the fun.

It all starts from this fictitious empire on a fictitious planet. The Tang Empire is facing a pivotal moment and from there, things start to go wild. Follow our heroes from the Tang Empire to the Far West, then the mysterious Skyland descending from the, duh, sky!
Embark on a journey that is natural, semi-natural, supernatural, meta-natural, and unnatural at the same time! Blend Wuxia and science fiction and fantasy and mythology together and it just works.

Take elements from Chinese mythology, Norse mythology, Celtic mythology, Arthurian mythology, Cthulhu mythology (yeah, we've got that covered, too), add modern pop culture, sprinkle a liberal dose of actual history, serve while hot.

Gatling guns vs swords vs crossbows vs pretty much anything you can think of.
Who said cowboys can't do Chinese kungfu, eh? Leave common sense behind, dude. It's holding you down.

The game comes with 30+ handcrafted "legend site" stages, from the mysterious Sanxingdui to the isle of Avalon to the glorious Valhalla. Take a break from the busy combat and solve these special challenges instead!
70010000106449.intro: Vinecard is a card strategy game that combines war chess and light rogue-like elements.
70010000106449.name: Vinecard

70010000113233.description:
You play as Morgan, an aspiring engineer headed home to complete your family's dream project - a rocket ship! Finding home not quite how she left it, Morgan will need to research and build clever contraptions and sprawling factories to help the locals. From simple drills and furnaces to complex assemblers, cranes and miles of conveyor belts, you'll convert local resources into useful materials and bring industry back to sleepy St. Ambroise.

- Build clever contraptions and sprawling factories to solve puzzles and help the town
- Get to know the locals, make lifelong friendships and become the heart of the community
- Research and invent new machines, energy sources and mechanical friends
- Discover a heartwarming story as Morgan, an aspiring engineer with high hopes for town!
- Finally build your family's rocket ship!

Outside of smashing together crazy contraptions, you'll need to mine out resources, explore coasts, railyards, quarries and underground areas - each part of town has its own materials to inspire you! You'll need to complete challenges, incorporate electrical elements, water, cranes, furnaces, crafting, automate through robotics, and loads more to ensure St. Ambroise returns to its former glory. Are you ready to roll up your sleeves?
70010000113233.name: Little Rocket Lab - Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition

70050000062529.description: Wave 2: Additional story content – planned for release on December 10th, 2025
70050000062529.name: Additional story content

70050000066271.description:
You play as Morgan, an aspiring engineer headed home to complete your family's dream project - a rocket ship! Finding home not quite how she left it, Morgan will need to research and build clever contraptions and sprawling factories to help the locals. From simple drills and furnaces to complex assemblers, cranes and miles of conveyor belts, you'll convert local resources into useful materials and bring industry back to sleepy St. Ambroise.

- Build clever contraptions and sprawling factories to solve puzzles and help the town
- Get to know the locals, make lifelong friendships and become the heart of the community
- Research and invent new machines, energy sources and mechanical friends
- Discover a heartwarming story as Morgan, an aspiring engineer with high hopes for town!
- Finally build your family's rocket ship!

Outside of smashing together crazy contraptions, you'll need to mine out resources, explore coasts, railyards, quarries and underground areas - each part of town has its own materials to inspire you! You'll need to complete challenges, incorporate electrical elements, water, cranes, furnaces, crafting, automate through robotics, and loads more to ensure St. Ambroise returns to its former glory. Are you ready to roll up your sleeves?
70050000066271.name: Little Rocket Lab - Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition Upgrade Pack

70010000082542.description:
Ink Inside is a hand drawn adventure with beat-em-up meets dodgeball combat! When water seeps into a child's drawings, it warps their landscapes and turns once friendly doodles into mindless, soggy monsters. However - Play as Stick (Brian David Gilbert) an odd doodle in a kid’s notebook trying to discover who they are while fighting back against the "Sog" corrupting their world!

YOU can fight back against the invading “Sog” by hitting them in the face with dodgeball “CORES!” Hold and aim your attack before letting go at just the right time to trigger unique weapon “perks” - then get in close and knock the wet out of them with a melee
combo. Use more unique cores and combo attacks in action-packed dodgeball-meets-beat-em-up style combat that will see you dodging patterns of projectiles, using specials, and mastering a unique form of action RPG combat!
70010000082542.intro: Join the fun in a co-op action RPG with a Saturday morning cartoon vibe! Play as Stick, a doodle fighting the "Sog" corruption!
70010000082542.name: Ink Inside

70010000092336.description:
FatalZone, an auto-shooter with roguelike and RPG elements, is now out in full! A dangerous zombie virus has brought humanity to the brink of extinction, but we’re not going down without a fight! Combat hordes of zombies and send mercenaries on deadly expeditions to collect resources for one of the last survivor strongholds. Do everything you can to save humanity!

Survival takes a deadly toll…

Exterminate hordes of zombies in a world devastated by a deadly virus and collect resources for one of the last survivor camps. FatalZone is an auto shooter with roguelike and RPG elements where you fortify your camp and send mercenaries on deadly missions... all of that to save humanity!

Risk it all on deadly runs to create the most effective build and unlock a slew of new skills and new characters. Level up your merc on the battlefield and grant them new skill combos in the camp. The more runs, the more seasoned your veterans are, but everyone is mortal.

Develop your survivor camp to unlock buffs. Upgrade merc skills in the Training Hall, recruit new mercs at the Mercenary Base, and upgrade your weapons and armour in the workshop. Upgraded buildings increase your chances of survival.

During a run, your mercs are exposed to the virus that takes its toll on the body. A bigger viral load undermines a merc's physical state and increases their chances of developing a mutation that could be beneficial or detrimental. Experiment to create the most viable fighter!

If you're about to be overwhelmed by the zombies’ onslaught, run for your life! Evac is always an option — wrap your mission up early and live to fight another day. Just make it to the copter!

Features:
- Upgrade your camp to unlock buffs, equipment, and mercs
- Hire and train new mercs to replace KIAs
- Use the evac copter to wrap up missions early
- Create the most effective merc build
- Gain mutations that give unique skills or debuffs
- Use the inventory to place weapons and armour. Weapons grant starting fighting skills, while armour provides stats
- Choose from 6 levels of difficulty
- Fight on procedurally generated maps. Every run is a new challenge!
- Unlock numerous achievements to prove your mettle

The full version of the game includes:
- 5 locations
- 9 playable classes
- 57 unique perks for your Mercs
- 9 weapon types
- 9 armour types
- 9 ultimate abilities
- 43 offensive and defensive skills
- 15 weapon and offensive skill evolutions
- 41 enemy variations (with 21 unique designs)
- 6 difficulty levels for all locations
- 7 base buildings, each with their own functionality and 10 upgrade levels
- 51 Merc stats
- Numerous mutations that randomise said stats
- 5 boosters (not counting resources and experience)
- 330 achievements
70010000092336.intro: FatalZone is an auto shooter with roguelike and RPG elements set in a savage world of zombies. Exterminate zombie hordes, collect resources, upgrade your camp, and level up mercenaries.
70010000092336.name: FatalZone

70010000093015.description: Experience the beauty of winter in Aery – Winter Wonderland, a relaxing and immersive adventure where you take flight as a graceful bird. Explore breathtaking snowy landscapes, glide through icy valleys, and uncover a heartwarming story. Your journey follows Frosty, a curious traveler searching for a legendary magical flower hidden deep within the frozen world. As you soar through the skies, you’ll collect shimmering crystals that reveal pieces of the story, guiding you through different winter-themed environments. Each level offers a unique atmosphere, from serene snow-covered forests to towering ice peaks and frozen lakes, all designed to create a peaceful and visually stunning experience. With no enemies, no time limits, and no pressure, Aery – Winter Wonderland is all about relaxation and exploration. The smooth, flowing flight mechanics allow you to feel the freedom of the skies while enjoying the calming, atmospheric soundtrack. It’s the perfect game to unwind, escape into a magical world, and experience the joy of flight. Let yourself be carried away by the beauty of winter as you uncover the secrets of Frosty’s quest. Whether you’re a fan of tranquil exploration games or simply looking for a soothing experience, Aery – Winter Wonderland offers a visually enchanting journey filled with wonder, discovery, and the magic of flight.
70010000093015.intro: Explore a serene winter world in Aery – Winter Wonderland, collecting crystals and uncovering Frosty’s magical journey.
70010000093015.name: Aery - Winter Wonderland

70010000096131.description:
After a great war more than a decade ago, Europe lies in ruins, struggling to rebuild. In the heart of Florence, Italy, an ancient secret of immortality is buried deep within the city’s veins. A shadowy web spun over centuries, now slowly unraveling.

Is the fabled salvation a blessing... or a curse?

One day, you encounter a mysterious girl with snow-white hair and beauty eyes like a witch’s. From that moment, the gears of fate begin to turn.
70010000096131.intro: Return to Renaissance Florence and uncover an ancient secret of immortality.
70010000096131.name: Detective Girl: The Case of Immortality

70010000098912.description:
-Rekindle a Passion
Traveler's Refrain is a dark song-casting, story-driven action RPG about one man's quest to find his long-lost love and rekindle his passion. Armed with a magical bouzouki, Traveler will face horrific abominations, challenging puzzles, and unravel the mysteries of a dark forest forbidden to all, as an ancient conflict reaches a fever pitch. It is up to the player to defy the Mecha-Goddesses of Fate and find the machine that will reunite Traveler with his long-lost love. 

-Master the Art of Song-Casting
Traveler's magical instrument is capable of casting devastating song-spells as he battles enemies in a gorgeous, smooth combat system. Mix song-spells with elemental melee weapons to produce devastating combos. Show your mastery of music-combat, delivering perfectly timed song-spells and elevate combat to a completely different level.

-Explore a Forbidden Ancient Forest
A domain full of mysteries and secrets awaits! Dangers and opportunities lurk among the trees and ruins that fill the ancient woods. Traveler will meet other adventurers, pursuing their own goals, be they human or robot. He will also encounter ancient mysteries that only his mastery of song-spells can solve, by altering environments and manipulating objects.

-Customize the Soundtrack
Your choices will define how the music evolves, creating a unique soundtrack as you adventure through the forest. The Totems, spells, abilities, and more will allow you to customize the playstyle and face the complex dungeons and multi-phase boss battles on your own terms, defying the Fates - and perhaps defining the future of this dark world...

-Experience Hand-Crafted Artistry 
Every aspect of the game has been created to deliver a one-of-a-kind experience, from the painted art style to each layer of music. Traveler’s voice is provided by multi-genre artist Essenger, with additional voiceover provided by talented metal artists, representing the broad variety and sheer talent of the genre.
70010000098912.intro: Wield your magical instrument and defy the mecha-goddesses of fate in this Song-Casting Story Driven Action-RPG.
70010000098912.name: Traveler's Refrain

70010000103798.description:
ASCENDANCE is a calming, relaxing and minimalist first person 3D Platformer. 
Shape your way with mysterious abilities and rise with the enchanted wind platforms beyond the skies within a world which evolves and transforms around you. 

A journey which leads through different ages of our world awaits you. 

Features:
+ minimalistic and low poly aesthetics with colorful and vibrant vistas
+ peaceful and playful, easy to play and progress at your own pace
+ a emotional and enchanting soundtrack will accompany you on your journey
+ smooth platforming and flying gameplay
+ hidden secrets to find
+ 3 different and visual unique Levels
+ a mysterious surprise awaits you at the end
+ even more Levels, mechanics and time mode with future updates
70010000103798.intro: Enter the enigmatic world of ASCENDANCE and experience an enchanting and peaceful journey to the sky and beyond.
70010000103798.name: ASCENDANCE UNBOUND

70010000105674.description:
Players are special beings who can connect with Mamons (monsters) summoned from another world. Raise and train your Mamons with kindness, and sometimes strictness!

After winning countless tournaments, when you defeat the strongest Mamon, you will become the world's king: the Mamon King!

*38 Unique Mamons

Mamon boast distinctive appearances, each excelling in different training areas and possessing varying lifespans. Grasping their traits is your first step to victory.

*Over 170 Skills

Mamon's signature skills go beyond mere attack and defense, creating deep strategic depth. Master evolving skills through repeated use to forge even more powerful weapons.

*Experience the Ultimate Tactical Battle in 1-on-1 Command Combat

It's not just about attacking, defending, buffing, or debuffing. Using skills consumes SP, and more powerful skills demand greater SP—or even greater sacrifices. Timing your moves will decide your fate.

Experience unparalleled tactical depth in this 1-on-1 command-based battle system, designed to be accessible yet offering the most intense strategic gameplay.

*Strengthen Your Mamon Through Training, Tournaments, and Expeditions

Training isn't the only way to hone your Mamon—it's also about deciding what to do each week at home. Mamon grows stronger not only through tournaments against rivals but also via Expeditions, where you advance through uncharted lands rumored to hold ancient Mamon in a board game-style format.

*Your Unique Mamon

A Mamon's potential blossoms through your skill and luck. Inheritance Summoning passes on the power of your trained Mamon. And with help from a shady scientist or a muscle-bound trainer, your Mamon might gain powers beyond its natural limits?

The monster-raising game set on a ranch has evolved!

Experience a new kind of raising in Mamon King!
70010000105674.intro: Aim to become the strongest king with uniquely charming monsters!
70010000105674.name: Mamon King

70010000106383.description:
Mascot Horror in a 90´s escape room! deliver your pizza order to Tagomago´s Mansion, but be careful, dinner is not the pizza..it’s YOU! escape from this haunted house and his 7 cannibalish inhabitants in a time loop with more than 25 endings!

The sequel to BAOBABS MAUSOLEUM and the second game on Jacob Jazz´s TREELOGY!
70010000106383.intro: Deliver the pizza. Escape the mansion. Don’t become the dinner in this 90’s mascot horror sandbox adventure trapped in a twisted time loop with 25 freaky endings!
70010000106383.name: Jacob Jazz`s Tamarindo`s Freaking Dinner™

70010000107529.description:
Challenging turn-based combat with a twist

Battle through tactical turn-based combat where death is always just around the corner, made more challenging due to a simple rule: Every turn, units must move and attack. No waiting for enemies to come to you, and be mindful of your more destructive units - they may take down a few allies if you're not careful.

Battle powerful, dark foes

Venture across the land and into the depths below to fight off corrupt, menacing creatures not of this world. Powerful bosses, life leeching enemies, and more await you in the depths.

Build your party

Gain XP through battles and events and spend it to hire, promote, and upgrade units as you see fit to build a powerful party.

Features:
- Build and grow your party with a variety of unit types and specialties. Elite and specialized units can be unlocked by promoting units with the XP earned from battle.
- Grow your units with powerful upgrades, but choose wisely as not everyone can specialize in everything.
- Battle through procedurally generated conflicts set across five unique biomes as you venture further into the depths below.
- Face powerful bosses and elite enemies along your journey.
- Choose your path and respond to unexpected challenges and events as you venture forth.
- Unlock additional difficulty levels, powerful upgrades, and unique starting parties as you play the game.
70010000107529.intro: Unto Deepest Depths is a turn-based strategy game where all units must move and attack every turn. Build your party, upgrade your units, and lead them.
70010000107529.name: Unto Deepest Depths

70010000107534.description:
Enjoy a variety of wintry party games with simple controls!
From snowball fights to battles on the ice, there's winter fun for everyone!
Share Joy-Con™ controllers for up to six players to join in the fun!
Whether you're partying with family and friends or playing solo, there's a mode for every mood!

[Free Mode]
Pick a game and play!
Practice on your own or face off against friends!

[Party Mode]
Play a series of games to determine the champion!
Win or lose, the fun never stops!

[Online Mode]
Battle it out on snowy stages with players from around the world!
Hop into a Quick Match for fast and thrilling fun!
70010000107534.intro:
Slide around, throw snowballs, and aim to be champion!
Play solo or together—the winter party begins!
70010000107534.name: Slide! Throw! Snow Party

70010000109257.description:
Take your place on the throne in this captivating game of strategy and perception. Royal Watch: The Throne's Duty challenges you to become the all-seeing eye of your kingdom.
As the Royal Observer, your duty is to watch every move in the court. Analyze actions, detect patterns, and pass your judgment. Your gaze is law, and your attention shapes the fate of the realm.
Inspired by classic observation games, Royal Watch offers a fresh experience with:
* A deep and strategic "watch-and-deduce" core gameplay
* A unique art style that brings your kingdom to life
* New mechanics that reward careful attention and logic
* Challenging scenarios that test your power of observation
The crown is heavy, and the throne's duty is never done. Are you ready to take up the watch?
70010000109257.intro: A strategic game of royal observation and deduction.
70010000109257.name: Royal Watch: The Throne's Duty

70010000109864.description:
This is a shooting game released by T&E SOFT in 1987. Players take on the role of a Mission Striker, engaging in dogfights against the Gilcen Army.

The game is a vertical-scrolling shooter where you fight using your main shot and option weapons (a combined attack is possible during two-player co-op). While a shooter, it also features RPG elements like leveling up. Your ship's level increases based on your enemy kill rate after each stage, and reaching a certain level adds new option weapons. Your ship uses a damage system rather than a lives system, allowing for seamless dogfighting.

The game has 14 stages, each ending with a boss for thrilling battles. Enjoy intense fights against the Gilcen army by mastering dazzling maneuvers, your main shot, option weapons, and combined attacks in two-player mode.


*This application does not have a scene select mode.
*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
70010000109864.intro: A renowned shooting game that made its mark in the history of MSX. Fight through using not only your shots, but also by skillfully employing option weapons!
70010000109864.name: EGGCONSOLE SUPER LAYDOCK MISSION STRIKER MSX

70010000110379.description:
Welcome to a farm where nothing makes sense.

One minute, you’re feeding the animals…

The next, you’re in a turn-based battle against a chicken throwing ninja kicks at your face.

You win, you capture him and—WHAT?!—
He transforms into a handsome anime boy asking you out?!

In Farm Love Legend, every farm animal hides a secret human form.

Every battle could unlock a brand-new romance.
And every boy’s personality is wild in his own way:

• A shy lamb boy who melts at every hug…
• A flirty fox boy who loves teasing you…
• A strong bull warrior with a tender heart…

Your choices decide who becomes your ultimate farm husbando.
(And yeah… try not to make the others jealous)


GAME FEATURES:

♥ CAPTURE & TRANSFORM: Battle animals like in a monster game… then date them as charming anime boys

♥ TURN-BASED COMBAT: Strategy + seduction = chaos

♥ ROMANCE & VISUAL NOVEL CHOICES: Chat, bond, unlock moments you’ll never forget

♥ FARM LIFE + LOVE LIFE: Upgrade your home and deepen your relationships

♥ MULTIPLE ENDINGS: Who will be the one waiting for you at the barn?


It’s ridiculous.
It’s hilarious.
It’s sexy in a “WAIT WHAT?!” way.

Are you ready to fall in love with your farm?
70010000110379.intro:
Capture. Transform. Date.
Wait… you turned a bull into a husbando?!
70010000110379.name: Farm Love Legend: Transform your Animals into Anime Boys

70010000110563.description:
Get ready to slide into an enchanted swamp full of magical puzzles!
In Toad Slide, a Sokoban-inspired 2D pixel-art puzzle, you control a mystical toad who must move runic stone blocks and place them onto magic circles to restore balance to the swamp.

With 30 carefully crafted levels, 15 by day and 15 by night, the game blends clear logic, smooth gameplay, and gradually increasing challenges that invite you to think precisely and act strategically.

How to play:

Grid movement: Slide the toad in four directions and plan each move carefully.

Mystic tongue: Pull blocks with your tongue if the path is clear — but be careful, one mistake and you’re stuck!

Swallow and spit: The toad can swallow a block and then spit it, making it slide until it hits a wall, another block, or the correct circle.

Quick retry system: Undo or restart instantly — every attempt is a new chance to master the puzzle.

Blocks glow softly when placed correctly, helping you stay focused on the perfect solution.

Explore the Magical Swamp, a world divided between the gentle light of day and the mysterious calm of night. Master the power of the guardian toad and prove you’re the true puzzle master of the swamp!
70010000110563.name: Toad Slide

70010000087753.description:
About The Game:

Experience the events of ‘Terminator 2: Judgment Day’ brought to life through glorious pixel artwork and action-packed arcade gameplay! Play as Sarah Connor and the T-800 through a variety of thrilling missions as they take on the T-1000 and try to put a stop to Skynet’s plans before the human race is annihilated. Lead the Resistance as John Connor in the future, fighting on the front lines as mankind’s only hope in the War Against the Machines. In this unique story blending iconic scenes from ‘Terminator 2: Judgment Day’ with original scenarios and multiple endings, humanity’s fate is yours to decide.

KEY FEATURES

Step into a classic arcade experience that pays homage to the Terminator universe with authentic arcade gameplay, music and visuals built from the ground up.

Relive iconic moments and forge new paths as Sarah, John and the T-800 in a narrative featuring a mix of classic Terminator 2: Judgment Day scenes and untold Terminator stories.

Shoot, sneak and escape the T-1000’s blades in a wide array of levels, and lead the Resistance as John Connor in critical Future War missions.

Battle against the full force of Cyberdyne and Skynet’s arsenal, with multiple enemy types and adrenaline-pumping boss fights to take on.

See the world of Terminator 2: Judgment Day like never before with detailed 2D sprite artwork of your favourite characters and scenes.

Enjoy a cinematic soundtrack featuring recrafted music from the legendary Terminator 2: Judgment Day score and all-new compositions.

Aim for the highest rank in each level to reign supreme on your high score table and achieve arcade immortality.

Mix things up with multiple different game modes to choose from: Story Mode, Arcade Mode, Infinite Mode, Boss Rush, Mother of the Future and Level Training!
70010000087753.intro: Experience the thrill of T2 with arcade action & pixel-perfect graphics!
70010000087753.name: Terminator 2D: NO FATE

70010000091921.description:
Everyone’s favourite dinosaur with a gentle heart in the Jurassic Era, “Dino.”
One day, indiscriminate slaughter by brutal dinosaurs has begun in a peaceful forest.

“Dino” sees his lovely girlfriend, “Meeshell” and his friends trying to escape, and decides to fight for them.
Curls up himself, transforms into a ball with hyper strong power, and attack the enemy dinosaurs!
“Dino” is taking a step into his epic adventure to bring peace back to the sky, sea and earth.

The stages are inspired by the Earth 200 million years ago.
This hierarchal action pinball game that you will explore on land, sea and sky, and attack the enemies.
Natural disaster and sudden weather change will bring you more excitement. Volcanic explosions, tectonic movements, seas filled by lava, sand storms and more…

Beautiful visual arts and impressive sounds and music is created by the famous composer, Ichiro Haneda.

Features: 
* Gallery: view images from the original game’s illustrations, posters, box design, etc. 
* Jukebox: listen to any of the game music tracks any time you want. 
* Rewind/Turbo function: repeat something until you achieve perfection, or speed things up 
* Cheats function: activate cheats that will make your mission a lot easier (infinite lives, invulnerability, etc.) 
* Save state function: save wherever you want to in the game, and restart from that exact point 
* Screen filters: select from several filters to modify how the game looks (retro-style monitor, black-and-white, etc.) 
* This game is re-release of “Dino Land” which the first launched in 1990s for home consoles.
70010000091921.intro: When Dino rolls into a ball he can knock down the mightiest dinosaurs!
70010000091921.name: Dino Land

70070000030962.description:
Discover the perfect balance of strategy and skill in Snooker Fever.  This game brings the classic snooker experience to the Nintendo Switch™, whether you're a seasoned snooker player or just picking up a cue for the first time.

With 10 beautifully crafted tables, customizable cues, and CPU opponents that keep you on your toes, every game feels fresh. Take on the challenge solo or invite a friend for some local competition. Focus on sinking that perfect shot, while the stunning 3D visuals capture the atmosphere of a real snooker hall.

Snooker Fever has all the tools you need to master the game, enjoy some friendly competition, and just have a great time.

Key Features:

10 different tables 
15 custom cues 
3 levels of opponents
Local multiplayer 
Smooth controls and realistic 3D graphics

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #1, Expansion Pack #2, Expansion Pack #3 and Expansion Pack #4 with:

20 stunning new table designs
10 sleek cue styles
70070000030962.intro: The classic pool experience, right at home!
70070000030962.name: Snooker Fever Rack 'n' Roll

70070000031698.description:
Your adventure begins with Food Truck Tycoon. Cook, chop, bake and enjoy hundreds of unique dishes.

But the journey of a thousand dishes is just the beginning!

As you hone your cooking skills and build your reputation with food trucks, you'll be given the opportunity to explore more gourmet games as DLC.

Customize your kitchen with countless upgrades and serve delicious food in different locations. Keep the grill hot, keep your customers smiling, sauté, mix and serve to the top.

Face cooking challenges to become the ultimate chef in town!

So put on your apron, sharpen your knives and enter the cooking arena. Life is a party - let's cook delicious!

This bundle contains "Cooking Arena", "Salad Bar Tycoon" and "Kebab Bar Tycoon".
70070000031698.intro: Universe bursting with flavors and culinary adventures awaits!
70070000031698.name: Cooking Arena Ultimate Feast

70010000095592.description:
Face powerful bosses in intense, strategic encounters where every duel demands skill, precision, and careful planning to overcome your foes.
Sharpen your reflexes, master counterattacks against each boss’s unique abilities, and conquer brutal challenges where accuracy decides the line between defeat and victory.

Key Features:

High-quality pixel art style: detailed retro visuals with striking charm.

Immersive atmosphere: transporting players to the era of the samurai in feudal Japan.

Precise and responsive gameplay: smooth, refined controls ensuring fair and fast-paced combat.

Skill-based progression: enhance your technique and rise to become a true master.
70010000095592.intro: A lone samurai facing battles between life and death.
70010000095592.name: Samu

70070000032244.description:
It looks like a normal day at the café… but suddenly, swarms of love-craving cats are storming in, and only you stand between them and total feline chaos! Armed with laser pointers, yarn balls, and even the dreaded pickle of doom, you’ll have to keep these fluffballs at bay while serving your customers their precious coffee. No big deal, right?

Features:
- Face down hordes of fluffy invaders
- Unlock 9 quirky toys and 7 heroic waiters
- Conquer shifts in 3 different café battlegrounds
- Upgrade your waiters and toys to become the strongest cat-wrangler
- Enjoy purr-fectly fun gameplay and cute visuals

Get ready for waves of fur and whiskers as you protect two cozy cafés. Upgrade your toys and special skills to become the best cat-fighting waiter around! With each shift, you’ll unlock new waiters, fun toys, and even more cat-tastrophes!

Can you save your café before the cats take over?
70070000032244.intro: The purr-fect storm is coming! Can you protect your café from fluffy chaos?
70070000032244.name: Sweet Survivors: Classy Edition

70070000032251.description:
Puzzle Book: Animals Edition offers 60 different puzzles to solve, divided into themes - from fantasy to dinosaurs. Arts for this game were made by artists specialized in various styles. They are beautiful paintings of creatures and landscapes or simpler drawings for kids. There is something for everyone!

This bundle includes:
- Puzzle Book
- Puzzle Book: Cats Pack
- Puzzle Book: Ocean Views
- Puzzle Book: Foxes Pack
- Puzzle Book: Adventure Pack

Speaking of everyone, you can adjust the difficulty by selecting the number of fragments per puzzle - from 6 to as much as 150! It’s a great title for both children and adults. Add peaceful music that plays in the background and you’ve got a great, relaxing afternoon.

Hungry for some competition? Or you just want to assemble pieces with friends or family? Try co-op mode! Just share a Joy-Con™ with another person and start doing puzzles together.

Features:
- 60 different puzzles to solve, divided into themes
- Each stage has 6 difficulties - from 6 pieces to 150
- Beautiful arts created by various artists
- Play solo or with a friend in co-op mode
- Use the touchscreen or Joy-Con™ controller
70070000032251.intro: If you’re missing the magic of doing jigsaw puzzles, then you’ve come to the right place!
70070000032251.name: Puzzle Book: Animals Edition

70010000097593.description:
Tombi and his friend Zippo are in search of Tombi's girlfriend, Tabby. Was she kidnapped by the Evil Pigs? Is she safe? Tombi must use all of his agility, guile and cunning disguises to save Tabby and defeat the Evil Pigs once and for all.

• Gorgeous 3D graphics that instantly transport you to Tombi's world
• All new weapons, items and costumes to collect and use against the Evil Pigs
• A massive 137 different missions to complete
• New exclusive features such as rewind and save anywhere
• A museum filled with rare artwork and much more
70010000097593.intro: TOMBI RETURNS IN A NEW ASTOUNDING 3D ADVENTURE!
70010000097593.name: Tombi! 2: The Evil Swine Return Special Edition

70010000080037.description:
Hop on your broomstick and “trouble” yourself with a spellbinding bullet-hell Cute' Em Up adventure! 

Originally released in 2007, Trouble Witches has evolved into the ultimate Cute' Em Up experience after over a decade of development and updates. Now, in Trouble Witches FINAL! Episode 01 Daughters of Amalgam, this manic shooter returns with a visual overhaul, new game modes and its most complete version ever. 

Take on 6 distinctive stages across 4 difficulty levels, filled with vibrant enemies, dazzling magical effects, and intense bullet-hell challenges. Choose from 12 cute witches, each paired with magical familiars and boasting unique abilities and playstyles, ensuring every playthrough feels fresh and exciting. 

Discover the stories of 12 playable characters in a fully Japanese-voiced Story Mode with revamped English subtitles. Each character's unique storyline brings depth and personality to their magical adventures. Beyond the story, a variety of extra modes offer endless replayability: 

Arcade Mode: Try the standard version of "Trouble Witches" across 4 difficulty levels. 

- Walpurgis Night Mode: Face chaotic, intensive battles with powered-up enemies. 

- Score Attack Mode: Compete for the highest score in 2- or 5-minute timed runs. 

- Endless Mode: See how far you can go as the difficulty keeps ramping up. 

- Boss Attack Mode: Go toe-to-toe with bosses in heated battles. 

- AC Mode: Experience the original arcade version in its faithful, replicated form. 

- Practice Mode: Hone your skills and master the different game mechanics. 

This "Final" edition also includes: 

- Adorable Witches: Play as 12 unique characters with distinctive abilities, attack styles, and magical familiars for endless strategic depth. 

- Bullet-Hell Gameplay: Experience exhilarating shoot 'em up action with extreme danmaku mechanics that will put your reflexes to the test. 

- Unique Combat System: Summon the Magic Circle to slow down enemy fire and convert bullets into gold coins. Spend your earnings at the Pumpkin Shop on Magic Cards that grant powerful abilities, clear bullets, and protect your witch from harm.   

- Vibrant Visuals: Stunning hand-drawn 2D character designs combined with beautifully reimagined 3D stage backgrounds for a fresh, eye-catching experience. 

- Complete DLC Pack: Includes all previously released DLC content (Cotton available separately). 

- Endless Replayability: Infinite fun for both casual and hardcore players, thanks to 8 different game modes. 

Whether you're a fan of fast-paced bullet-hell shoot 'em up or charming Japanese anime-inspired art styles, Trouble Witches FINAL! Episode 01 Daughters of Amalgam delivers the ultimate Cute' Em Up experience. Play and enjoy the definitive version of a beloved gem of the genre!
70010000080037.intro: Wild and witch-filled Cute 'Em Up in Bullet-Hell
70010000080037.name: Trouble Witches FINAL! Episode 01 Daughters of Amalgam

70010000104743.description:
Saddle up and enter the wild, fantastical world of Toy Cowboy Royale: RPG Dragon’s Challenge! Take on the role of a daring toy cowboy in a magical land filled with dragons, treasures, and epic battles. Explore vibrant landscapes, complete challenging quests, and face legendary dragons in intense RPG combat. Customize your cowboy, upgrade weapons, and master unique abilities as you fight to become the ultimate hero of the realm.

Features:
	•	Epic RPG Adventure: Embark on thrilling quests and face powerful enemies in a colorful, toy-inspired world.
	•	Dragon Battles: Challenge legendary dragons with strategy, skill, and courage.
	•	Exploration and Discovery: Roam diverse environments filled with secrets, treasures, and hidden challenges.
	•	Strategic Combat: Use weapons, skills, and tactics to overcome dangerous foes.

Are you ready to prove your bravery and conquer the dragons? Your adventure begins now!
70010000104743.intro: Embark on an epic toy cowboy adventure.Battle legendary dragons and claim your glory.
70010000104743.name: Toy Cowboy Royale : RPG Dragon's Challenge

70010000105221.description:
Get ready to hit the streets and build your own bus empire! Experience the thrill of realistic driving, the challenge of managing a transport company, and the satisfaction of keeping a city moving. Whether you're navigating traffic or optimising routes, every decision counts in this immersive simulator.

Key Features:
• Vast Open World – Explore a huge city with distinct zones: bustling downtowns, quiet suburbs, and industrial districts.
• Authentic Bus Driving – Stick to schedules, sell and check tickets, and handle quirky passenger interactions.
• Fleet Management – Operate diesel, electric, and double-decker buses. Fuel, maintain, and upgrade them as you grow.
• Company Building – Create custom routes, hire staff, manage income and expenses, and expand your business.
• Game Modes – Dive into Career Mode to grow from a rookie driver to a transport tycoon, or relax in Endless Mode and drive freely through the city.

Follow the rules, respect the schedule, and master the road — your passengers are counting on you. Are you ready to become the king of city transit?
70010000105221.intro: Drive the city. Master the route. Rule the road.
70010000105221.name: BUS SIM 25 - CITY SIMULATOR

70010000106112.description:
Embark on a harrowing journey into the heart of darkness with Escape From Pripyat, a narrative-driven shooter that plunges you into a realm where fear and survival intertwine. You assume the role of a fearless investigative reporter, part of a specialized unit dispatched to document the unfolding horrors within the desolate ruins of Pripyat. However, your mission takes a sinister turn when your helicopter is brutally attacked by an enigmatic creature, leaving you as the sole survivor amidst the eerie aftermath.
In this relentless struggle for survival, you must navigate treacherous environments, battling grotesque mutants and hostile adversaries while unearthing the chilling secrets buried within Chernobyl's shadowy depths. Armed with your wits, firearms, and an array of melee weapons, you'll delve into abandoned buildings and hazardous territories, scavenging for crucial supplies and piecing together the fragmented truth.

Game Features:
	•	Immersive Horror Atmosphere: Prepare to be immersed in a chilling atmosphere enriched with unsettling sounds, nerve-wracking jump scares, and haunting soundtracks that amplify the tension.
	•	Dynamic Gameplay Mechanics: Master the art of interaction with the environment, from scavenging essential resources to manipulating environmental elements for tactical advantage.
	•	Survival Essentials: Manage hunger, thirst, and inventory meticulously as you navigate a realistic day-night cycle that dynamically influences gameplay.
	•	Narrative Depth: Engage with a compelling storyline driven by your quest to survive, uncover the mysteries of Chernobyl, and confront the horrors that lurk in its darkest corners.
	•	Combat Mastery: Enhance your combat prowess through precision aiming, strategic melee combat, and unexpected encounters that test your reflexes and resourcefulness.

Escape From Pripyat challenges you to confront your deepest fears, to unravel the enigma of Chernobyl's haunting legacy, and to emerge victorious from the abyss. Are you prepared to face the unknown, reporter? Your odyssey into darkness begins now.
70010000106112.intro: Survive the silent ruins where danger lurks in every shadow.
70010000106112.name: Chernobyl: Escape from Pripyat

70010000108862.description:
Step into the heart of intense, fast-paced combat with Call of Warfare - FPS Modern Shooter, a groundbreaking military shooter that brings tactical warfare to your fingertips. As part of an elite squad, you'll engage in high-stakes 5v5 battles, strategically outsmarting rival teams while striving to eliminate their 1000-point score before they can do the same to you. With your team's survival on the line, every decision, every shot, and every move counts.
Key Features:
- Tactical Combat: Take on the role of a highly-trained operative and lead your team through intense skirmishes, using strategy and skill to outsmart your opponents.
- Points-Based Warfare: Every kill deducts points from your team's score. Lose all points and face defeat.
- Dynamic Maps: Battle across diverse environments, each offering unique challenges and opportunities.
- Massive Arsenal: Choose from over 20 weapons, including rifles, shotguns, and grenades, to suit your playstyle.
- Immersive Action: Realistic gunplay and visuals bring the battlefield to life, putting your tactical skills to the ultimate test.

Get ready to experience warfare like never before in Call of Warfare - FPS Modern Shooter. Join the battlefield, hone your skills, and prove you have what it takes to lead your squad to victory. The ultimate test of strategy and skill awaits. Will you answer the call?
70010000108862.intro: Outsmart, Outgun, Outlast. The Battlefield Awaits
70010000108862.name: Call of Warfare - FPS MODERN SHOOTER

70050000058399.description:
It’s a magical crossover! Cotton & Silk bring their own “Trouble” to the Trouble Witches universe! 

The Trouble Witches world just got even more magical! Expand your spell-binding and witchy roster with the arrival of Cotton and her companion Silk in this extra character DLC: a special collaboration with the beloved "Cotton" series! 

This DLC includes: 

- New Playable Character: Cotton 
Take control of the young and powerful witch Cotton, joined by her cheeky fairy companion, Silk! With a completely unique playability, Cotton brings a fresh experience and chaos to this title. 

- Cotton Story Mode: 
Enjoy the original story featuring Cotton as she stumbles into the Trouble Witches world! Fully voiced in Japanese and filled with quirky dialogue, this exclusive scenario blends the humor and charm of the Cotton series with the bullet-hell thrills of Trouble Witches. 

- Exclusive Cotton BGM: 
Immerse yourself in the extra Cotton soundscape! Switch between the original Trouble Witches soundtrack and Cotton's own BGM whenever you like. 

Full Mode Compatibility: 
Whether you're battling through Arcade Mode, braving Walpurgis Night, or chasing high scores in Score Attack, Cotton is fully playable across all game modes 

*Please note that to download the Cotton DLC, the base game “Trouble Witches FINAL! Episode 01 Daughters of Amalgam” must be installed in your console.
70050000058399.intro: Cotton & Silk join the Cute 'Em Up adventure in the Trouble Witches universe, seeking her favourite WILLOW!
70050000058399.name: Cotton DLC

70010000024003.description:
Nymn is a young Djunn, who has been separated from his pack. Lost, nervous and alone, he needs to find his way through the sprawling forest of Tanglewood—a place of darkness, night terrors and strange, hungry beasts.

Help Nymn make it through to morning by using special abilities, lateral thinking and quick reactions to avoid, defeat and overcome the challenges and monsters that await! Fast-paced 2D platforming meets interesting puzzles, tricks and surprises.

This definitive release of Tanglewood features many enhancements such as widescreen support, high quality audio, new levels, achievements, and an all-new storybook mode which tells the tale of Tanglewood and how it came to be.

Tanglewood is a true 16-bit game, originally designed and programmed on 90’s hardware, and is a love letter to the golden age of pixel art gaming. The game spans eight story chapters, hand-crafted pixel art with fluid animation, an original soundtrack by Freezedream, and many secrets, achievements and collectibles.
70010000024003.intro: Guide Nymn home using lateral thinking and quick reactions to avoid, defeat and overcome the challenges and monsters that await! A true love letter to 16-bit, pixel art gaming.
70010000024003.name: TANGLEWOOD

70010000106138.description:
POLICE BORDER CONTRABAND PATROL SIMULATOR is a tense border control simulator where every decision matters. Start as a rookie officer inspecting documents, uncovering smuggling attempts, and facing moral dilemmas in a world full of corruption and temptation.
Will you enforce the law or bend it for your gain? Climb the ranks, survive the pressure, and shape your fate across multiple possible endings.

Key Features:
	•	Advanced document and ID verification mechanics
	•	Contraband search in hidden areas of vehicles
	•	Direct interactions with drivers: interrogations, arrests, moral decisions
	•	Progression system with ranks that impact gameplay
	•	Black market mechanics and smuggling jobs
	•	Real consequences for mistakes and ethical choices
	•	Controller support and simple, intuitive control schemes

Available now. It’s time to take your place at the border—how far will you go?
70010000106138.intro: Patrol. Inspect. Intercept. Justice starts with you.
70010000106138.name: POLICE BORDER CONTRABAND PATROL SIMULATOR

70010000107831.description:
Get ready for the most exciting fight of your life in Lucha Align, the puzzle game where every piece is a luchador ready for action! Your mission is clear: fit the champions and completely fill the ring to claim victory in style.

With 40 levels full of action, each match brings new shapes, new challenges, and even more excitement. From the first training sessions to the ultimate battles, you’ll need strategy, quick thinking, and the spirit of a champion to master every grid and earn the special stars.

What awaits you in the ring:

Simple and addictive mechanics: select, move, rotate, and place your pieces to win.

A true climb in difficulty: from easy moves to master-level combinations.

A vibrant atmosphere with colourful visuals and lively sound effects turning each stage into a spectacle.

Special stars for players who prove they’re true champions of the board.

Are you ready to wear your mask, climb the ropes, and show who rules the ring?
70010000107831.intro: Step into the ring of fun!
70010000107831.name: Lucha Align

70010000099256.description:
A shoot ’em up set in the world of the RPG “BAROQUE”
returns as “REVERSED”, now available on Nintendo Switch™.

The story takes place in the Neuro Tower,
a mysterious structure overrun by countless enemies.
You must fight through them using the items you acquire along the way
to reach the final boss that awaits in the deepest depths.

This release adds a variety of new features.
It offers plenty to enjoy for both newcomers
and those who played the original extensively.

■ Game Features
・Strategic Player Tuning
Items can alter your attack power, attack pattern, and speed.
Depending on the order in which you collect them and their attributes,
you can fine-tune your setup with great precision.

・Multiple Ways to Play
The game features both Standard Mode and Score Attack Mode,
along with five difficulty levels to match your preferred play style.

■ New Features
・Revamped Status Display
The status display has been completely redesigned.
You can also switch back to the original version if you prefer.

・Great Heat Gallery
A special gallery featuring wallpapers from past “Great Heat Memorial Days.”
Unlock conditions must be met to view them.

・Title Wallpaper Switch Feature
Allows you to set gallery images as the background of the title screen.

・Continue Feature
Lets you restart even after a game over.

・Additional BGM
Includes several background tracks from previous BAROQUE titles,
newly remastered for this release.
70010000099256.intro:
The spin-off of the dark fantasy RPG “BAROQUE”,
BAROQUE SHOOTING, is now available on Nintendo Switch™!
70010000099256.name: BAROQUE SHOOTING: REVERSED

70010000099390.description:
"BAROQUE Become a Meta-Being" Returns—Powered Up for Nintendo Switch™!

■ Game Overview
In this game, you play as Grue, one of the minor enemies that appear in BAROQUE.
Use jumps and quick movements in all directions to see how far you can progress through the dungeon known as the Neuro Tower.
Will you take cautious steps forward, or leap boldly ahead? With simple controls, anyone can enjoy the challenge.
You’ll also encounter many familiar characters from the original game, such as Moon and Kato.

By using the rewards you earn based on the distance you travel, you can obtain various types of Grue, such as the "Muscle Grue" and the "Jellyfish Grue." You can also change your appearance to the Grue you’ve obtained and play as them.


■ New Features
In addition to the Original Mode, where you test how far you can go without making a mistake, a brand-new Countdown Mode has been added.
In this mode, the challenge is to see how far you can go within 60 seconds. You can revive as many times as you want during the time limit, and the rewards you earn differ from those in Original Mode.

A new camera option, Another View, has also been added—switch from the top-down Normal View to a dynamic, close-up perspective from behind Grue for a more immersive experience.

Other improvements include interface adjustments and the ability to restart instantly with a single button press, making the game smoother and more enjoyable to play.
70010000099390.intro:
Become a Meta-Being and head for the Neuro Tower…
The protagonist is a Meta-Being!
A jumping action game set in the world of BAROQUE.
70010000099390.name: BAROQUE Become a Meta-Being Revive

70010000105689.description:
Use various weapons randomly found in dungeon treasure chests to defeat the enemies blocking your path!

You could charge forward, mowing down foes with melee weapons!

Or advance safely, picking off enemies with ranged weapons!

The playstyle is entirely up to you!
Dodge enemy attacks with rolls, defeat every floor boss, and see if you can reach the true ending!
70010000105689.intro: A thrilling action and shooting game where you battle using weapons with different capabilities.
70010000105689.name: MYRIAD DEATH

70010000110913.description:
Get ready for a heartwarming hexagonal puzzle adventure where clever thinking meets cosy charm. Guide the adorable Chippys, little squirrels with big personalities, as they collect every shiny acorn and make their way safely home.
Across 30 hand-crafted levels and three seasonal worlds: Spring, Summer and Autumn, you’ll twist, swap and align tiles to form perfect paths through nature’s maze.
Each move matters. Rotate or move tiles to connect acorns to the burrow, then watch your fluffy friends scurry along the path you built. It’s all about planning, precision and a touch of playful creativity.
As you advance, new tile types and tricky layouts appear, turning every stage into a fresh and rewarding puzzle.
Features:
• 30 handcrafted levels filled with charm and challenge
• Three cosy seasonal biomes: Spring, Summer and Autumn
• Rotate and move tiles to connect paths and gather all the acorns
• A clever hint system to keep you thinking without frustration
• A shuffle option for endless replayability
Relax, think and enjoy the company of your squirrelly friends. The Chippys are waiting for your help to find every last nut.
70010000110913.name: Hexa Chippy

70010000061890.description:
Build your camp, collect resources, craft equipment, face the dangers that this island driven mad by the corruption hides and uncover its mystery in this story-driven survival adventure for 1 to 4 players. 

· The weight of a prophecy lies on your shoulders…
Corruption has taken over the island of Insule and the creatures that live in it, a place that was once full of beauty and magic, and that only you can save from its ill fate.

· …but you don't have to carry it alone
Turn this story into a cooperative adventure for up to 4 players. Venture into the woods, swamps and caves, collaborate to build your camp and face all the dangers together.

· Make your camp your safe space
Keep yourself safe and get ready to continue with your adventure. Craft tools, upgrade your weapons, construct buildings, tend to your crops and animals or even cook energizing meals. Persuade its inhabitants to show you the blueprints to improve the structures and turn it into your home.

· Don't let your guard down on an island driven mad by the corruption
Help and learn from the customs of the creatures on the island, but be careful. Arm yourself, hunt for resources, defend yourself and seek the guidance of the Protectors to save this magical world.

· Everything you do will bring you closer to your ultimate goal
You are their last hope. Every battle you fight, every item you craft and every inhabitant you help will take you one step closer to your goal: solve each of their mysteries to save this magical world from its corruption.

MAIN FEATURES

· A story-driven game, with crafting and survival
·· Enjoy all the narrative plotlines that Oppidum offers in its more than 40 hours of content, and let yourself be guided directly to the action thanks to the mission markers.

· From 1 to 4 players with unique cross-play
·· Become the host of the game or join an existing one that evolves with every action of its participants, regardless of them playing at the same time or not. The game allows the inclusion of new members at any point, and they can start playing from the current moment of the story and with the presets of that game.

· Your character, your taste
·· Select their hairstyle, color, cosmetics, body shape, voice, favorite color or different face customizations, among others.

· Adaptive difficulty
·· It allows you to experience the adventure in your own way, offering not just predetermined levels, but the possibility of adjusting different parameters to customize the experience. Relaxed (without death), Smooth (enemy damage reduced), As Designed (the original balance thought by the developers) and Hardcore (bigger challenges).

· Accessibility options
·· Possibility of no button-holding, adjustable quest tracker visibility, customizable resource and enemy damage multipliers, adjustable durability settings for tools, weapons and armor or an option for a simplified fishing mode, among others.

· Highly replayable
·· Experience the adventure in new ways by trying the wide range of game settings, and discover the different experiences of playing solo and co-op.
70010000061890.intro: Enjoy Oppidum, a story-driven survival experience for 1-4 players full of adventure, action, crafting, exploration… Everything a squad of scouts would love for a good story to tell.
70010000061890.name: Oppidum

70010000076145.description:
Takashi has always dreamed of being a heroic fighter pilot in the prestigious Interspace Navy.

Unfortunately, he failed the military entrance exam due to his habit of daydreaming about beautiful women. One fateful day while working as a lowly freelance pilot on a routine mission, Takashi receives a mysterious distress message over an old radio channel. The voice calling for help is female and irresistible.

His incredible adventure has just begun.


Features:
* Visual novel
* Romance 4 women with unique personalities
* Fully animated 3D characters and environments
* Branching paths and 10 different endings
* Adjustable reading speed
70010000076145.intro: Romance beautiful women in this science fiction story
70010000076145.name: Ahhnalog 112

70010000104148.description:
You are the president of a railroad company.
Lay tracks, run trains, and experience building your very own city!
The theme of this work is “tourism.”
Develop tourist routes from distant cities and aim to create a bustling tourist city filled with people.
Providing realistic business management simulations of financing, investing, and more, as well as a wide variety of customizable options for all your vehicles, A-Train: All Aboard Tourism is packed full of features for you to explore.
But don't be overwhelmed—players old and new alike will be able to jump right into the series thanks to the fun and practical tutorials provided in the early stages.
So why not hop aboard the A-Train with your trusted team of advisors, and start crafting a bright future for your town?

【A Story to Save a Troubled Town】
Featuring 11 scenarios set in towns burdened by various circumstances—like “a town saddled with massive debt after opening a bullet train line” or “a town run by a railway company owning a perpetually loss-making baseball team”!
Every town holds hidden charm, especially tourist destinations lacking developed transportation networks, offering ample room for growth. It's where the president's skills truly shine—deciding which tracks to lay and what kind of towns to build.

【Aim to Become an A-Train Creator】
Featuring a “Construction” mode where you can freely shape terrain and place buildings without worrying about funds. Create anything from your ideal tourist attraction to real-world cities within the world of ‘A-Train’.
Vehicle plans in the scenario can be shared online! Of course, you can also download and play those created by other players.
Enjoy planning your trip with the same accessibility for everyone and the same boundless depth.

※This product is a bundle containing the main game “A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism” and the additional content “Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition Upgrade Pack.” If you already own “A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism,” please purchase only the additional content.
70010000104148.intro: A bustling city plan just for you
70010000104148.name: A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition

70010000105386.description:
Cast n Chill's a laid-back fishin’ game for folks who’d rather wet a line than break a sweat. Whether yer driftin’ on a lazy lake, pokin’ 'round a winding river, or droppin’ lines in salty blue water, this here’s a game where you set the pace.

Upgrade Yer Gear
Start with the basics, catch whatever bites, sell your haul, and put those coins toward better rods, reels, and upgrades. Before ya know it, you’ll be wranglin’ rare species that’d make any angler green with envy.

Explore New Waters
Find yer favourite fishin’ hole or keep wanderin’. There’s 16 peaceful spots to discover, each with its own critters swimmin’ 'round, just waitin’ to bite.

Pick Your Pace
In Active Mode, you’re in the thick of it - castin’, reelin’, and keepin’ busy like a loon at nesting time.
Switch to Passive Mode if you’d rather let the game do the work while you’re off choppin’ wood. 

Collect 'Em All
There’s  50 fish to discover - some you’ll recognize, some you’ll squint at and go “what in the heck is that?” From scrappy little sunfish to big ol’ deepwater beasts, they’re all in the logbook waitin’ for your name.

Legendary Catches
There’s 16 fish out there that still get folks jabberin’ at ol' Rusty's bait shop like they saw Bigfoot ride a moose. Land one, and you'll be part o' the legend.

Boat Buddies
Grab your rod and call a buddy, Cast 'n Chill now has co-op! Whether you’re lookin’ to kick back and fish side-by-side or stir up a bit of friendly competition, it’s all better with company.

Trusty Companion
Nothin’ beats a day on the lake with a four-legged friend. They might not know a spinnerbait from a spoon, but they’ll help you spot a fish - if only 'cause they’re hopin’ for a bite themselves.
70010000105386.intro: Catch rare fish, upgrade your gear and reel in legendary catches - all with your loyal companion.
70010000105386.name: Cast n Chill

70010000106257.description: Step into the role of Mori Granson, apprentice and subordinate to Hsiao, the head of the Magic Association. In the mage capital of Tarlin, your path will cross with Coccinea, a young woman you saved years ago, and a host of other compelling characters. As you adventure together, your mission extends beyond exploration: you must help this group forge strong bonds and become a true "Granson Family," a chosen family bound not by blood, but by choice. Will you succeed in uniting them?
70010000106257.intro: This is a thrilling text-based adventure set in a DND-style fantasy world! Recruit new allies, form unbreakable bonds, and experience epic tales and exciting
70010000106257.name: The Days Without Gods

70010000107448.description:
Clutchtime: Basketball is a deck builder centered around basketball plays and team synergies.

Different game modes:
• Elimination tournaments in true roguelike style, or
• Classic regular season where you can lose some games, but have to qualify and win the playoffs to become a Champion.

Each mode can be played in single player mode, or shared screen with your friends. You can set up custom modes like 2-player best-of-7 finals series, or a 3-player mini league where you play each other twice, once home and once away and then the top 2 players play the final game. It's fully customizable.

Each team has a starting deck of 5 starter players with 3 cards representing their skills.

Random events happen during the season, which allow you to:
• trade with other teams
• upgrade cards
• remove cards that don't fit your strategy
• duplicate your favorite cards
• and more...

Double Team your opponents and force Turnovers or create a dream team of Superstar shooters who Splash three pointers even while getting fouled.

You can also get team cards like:
• Timeout,
• Coach Challenge
• or even Complain to the Referees...
• ...to get a Tech.

Can you help your favorite team win the Championship?
70010000107448.intro: Build your perfect deck and become a Champion
70010000107448.name: Clutchtime: Basketball Deckbuilder

70010000108741.description:
What is Older? is a fun, brain-teasing game where you choose which historical event, invention, or milestone happened first. From fire to smartphones, test your sense of time and chase the ultimate high score!

Ever wondered if the wheel spun before the first pyramid was built? Or if cave paintings came before humans tamed dogs? In What is Older?, you’ll dive into the wild timeline of human history for a laugh-out-loud challenge. Pick between two options—Option A or Option B—and guess which one hit the scene first. Easy, right? Not when you’re stuck deciding if the compass sailed before the flush toilet or if the printing press outraced the first eyeglasses!

In this single-mode game, your mission is to stack up the highest score by nailing the older event, invention, or cultural moment. Our list covers everything from the first flicker of fire to the rise of modern gadgets, packed with epic achievements, quirky discoveries, and surprising milestones.

Get it right, and your score soars. Get it wrong, and you’re back to the Stone Age to try again! Perfect for history lovers, trivia fans, or anyone who enjoys a chuckle while learning something new, What is Older? will keep you guessing about the past. Ready to show you’re the sharpest time traveler around? Jump in and start picking!
70010000108741.intro: Think you know the history? Jump into the game and find out – choose wisely and become the champion!
70010000108741.name: What is Older?

70010000109183.description:
Take the role of a young graduate student in AI studies in Baradroid. Evan lives with 3 robots as a means of studying their behavior and teaching them to interact more naturally with humans. Evan hopes to develop a new generation of androids based on his research, one that can advance society and help overcome human limitations, but over time, one question grows in his mind.

Is it possible to teach a machine the meaning of human love? Baradroid is a visual novel and dating sim set in a futuristic and idealized world. Make key choices for Evan that guide the narrative and perhaps some romance as well… for science, of course.

• Explore relationships between a researcher and his robots!
• Immerse yourself in a futuristic visual novel adventure!
• Guide Evan’s efforts to advance AI technology!
• Make decisions that affect the narrative!
• Enjoy dating sim elements and unlockable scenes!
70010000109183.intro: Teach robots to experience love in a futuristic world where the lines between humanity and synthetic life begin to blur!
70010000109183.name: Baradroid

70010000112304.description:
